data.prayer: Please, convict the 23,277 believers in Capiz, Philippines to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Capiz, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Capiz, Philippines from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Capiz, Philippines to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Capiz who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Sama Bangingi, Northern Sama people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Capiz, Philippines not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Capiz, Philippines. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Capiz, Philippines has a population of 167,100.

We estimate Capiz has 23,277 people who might know Jesus, 128,726 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 15,097 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Capiz who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
